result.markdown: --- title: "" --- ## Week 4 ### Day 1 #### [Today]{style="color:red;"} - Lecture: Generalized Linear Models I - Lecture Code: GLM1.R - Install R packages: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} # CRAN packages install.packages(c("equatiomatic","brglm")) ``` ::: #### [Assigned]{style="color:red;"} - Readings for next class: - Zurr and Iano, 2016 - Background Reading (not required): - Zurr et al Chapter 9. ### Day 2 (lab) #### [Today]{style="color:red;"} - Discuss: Zurr and Iano, 2016 and assignment to co-lead application paper on topic - Lecture: Generalized Linear Models II - Downloads: Files #### [Assigned]{style="color:red;"} - Readings for next class: - Fieberg, Ch. 8 - Tredennick et al. 2021
